plot: A surreal homage, by percussionist Roger Turner and voice artist Phil Minton, to Paul Burwell - a man who loved drumming, the sea, whiskey, fireworks and very small sounds.
title: Sea Shanties
plot_es: A surreal homage, by percussionist Roger Turner and voice artist Phil Minton, to Paul Burwell - a man who loved drumming, the sea, whiskey, fireworks and very small sounds.
plot_en: A surreal homage, by percussionist Roger Turner and voice artist Phil Minton, to Paul Burwell - a man who loved drumming, the sea, whiskey, fireworks and very small sounds.
